All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Account database object.
AccountController
RestController for AccountDto instances.
AccountControllerLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of AccountController.
AccountDto
Data Transfer POJO for accounts.
AccountModelAssembler
RepresentationModelAssembler for AccountDto instances.
AccountNotFoundException
A RuntimeException thrown when an account with a given ID cannot be found in the DB.
AccountRepository
A JpaRepository for Account objects.
AccountService
Service class for accounts.
AccountServiceLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of AccountService.
BadPasswordLengthException
A RuntimeException thrown when a user attempts to register or even authenticate with a password whose length is less than 8 or more than 30 characters.
Constants
Various constants used by the code.
Currency
An enum with approximately 300 ISO 4217 currency identifiers.
CurrencyLedger
A utility class that generates randomly defined exchange rates between Currency instances.
CurrencyLedger.CurrencyPair
Simple POJO for defining ordered pairs of Currency instances.
CurrencyLedgerController
RestController for Currency exchange rates.
CurrencyLedgerControllerLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of CurrencyLedgerController.
CustomRepositoryAnnotation
 
ExceptionAdvice
RestControllerAdvice for all our custom (and one non-custom) exceptions.
InsufficientBalanceException
A RuntimeException thrown when the source account of a transaction that was just POST-ed does not have a balance that can cover the transaction's amount, in the transaction's currency.
InvalidAmountException
A RuntimeException thrown when a transaction with a non-positive amount is POST-ed.
InvalidBalanceException
A RuntimeException thrown when an account with a non-positive balance is POST-ed.
InvalidTransactionCurrencyException
A RuntimeException thrown when a transaction with a currency different from the target account's is POST-ed.
JwtAuthenticationController
RestController responsible for exposing POST endpoints for registering and authenticating users.
JWTAuthenticationControllerLogger
 
JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
Defines the default API response for unauthenticated calls to any endpoint.
JwtAuthenticationService
A service class that provides a single authentication method for users.
JwtAuthenticationServiceLogger
 
JwtRequest
Simple POJO for defining a user request for a JWT token.
JwtRequestFilter
A OncePerRequestFilter that filters every incoming request to make sure that it is properly authenticated with an unexpired JWT token.
JwtResponse
Simple POJO that defines the API's response to the user for a JWT token request.
JwtTokenUtil
Various utilities for generating and parsing JWTs.
JwtTokenUtilLogger
 
JwtUserDetailsService
Service class that talks to the database to retrieve and store user information.
JwtUserDetailsServiceLogger
 
Loc
Simple enum used by MethodLoggingMessages to log entrance or exit from methods.
MethodLoggingMessages
final class whose static methods are used by the various *Logger classes to log their messages.
OneOfTwoCurrenciesMissingException
A RuntimeException thrown when a user attempts to use the CurrencyLedgerController's GET endpoint with only one of the two request parameters set.
OpenAPI30Configuration
 
PasswordEncoderConfig
Defines a Spring Bean of type PasswordEncoder for the various components to use.
RepositoryLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of repositories annotated with CustomRepositoryAnnotation.
SameAccountException
A RuntimeException thrown when a transaction from an account to itself is POST-ed.
SecurityConfig
Spring Security configuration for API.
SpringBootAgileBankApplication
Central SpringBoot runner class.
Transaction
Transaction database object.
TransactionController
RestController responsible for exposing endpoints related to transactions.
TransactionControllerLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of TransactionController.
TransactionDto
Simple POJO that defines the data transfer object for transactions.
TransactionModelAssembler
RepresentationModelAssembler for TransactionDto instances.
TransactionNotFoundException
A RuntimeException thrown when a transaction with a given ID is not found in the database.
TransactionRepository
A JpaRepository for Transaction objects.
TransactionSanityChecker
A utility class used to perform several checks on a transaction to make sure it is valid.
TransactionService
Service class for transactions.
TransactionServiceLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of TransactionService.
User
Database object for application users.
UserDto
Data Transfer Object for application users.
UsernameAlreadyInDatabaseException
A RuntimeException thrown when the user tries to register with a username that already exists in the database.
UserRepository
A JpaRepository for User objects.
